name: Glicínia - Demo
description:
"Wisteria symbolizes romanticism for the Greeks and Romans with the aim of preserving the love between the couple." Story:

Warning: This game is not finished yet, i decided to post it to see if i get some motivation in finishing it. English is not my first language so if there is some mistake pls tell me!! 

The story revolves around Luara, a young adult who has a very complete life, a best friend, a quiet house and a concert by her band in three days!

The only problem is the frightening visions and horrible feeling of being chased that torment her at all times.

Could it be that by meeting a new person and reviewing the concepts of friendships in her life, she can get rid of this curse?

 Features:
  • A lot of words and drawings.
  • Choices.
  • There is three endings but is not complete so there is two paths you can take.
  • Realistic eyes, maybe a trypophobia warning?
  • Pretty characters!!
